node.category: What is the way things are?
What is the situation with TV & radio licence fees?

node.surface: Actually only those people should pay a TV & radio licence fee who really watch ARD, ZDF, Arte etc.

node.category: What are advantages of the TV & radio licence fees?

node.surface: It is in fact good to support sophisticated programming through fees.

node.category: Is the quality of the public channels good enough to be paid for?

node.surface: Curiously, however, there are still adverts and product placements on the public channels.

node.category: What is the problem of having adverts and product placements on the public channels?

node.surface: What are you paying for, then?

node.category: What about the actors on public channels?

node.surface: That the same actors time and again get to have a laugh at exotic shooting locations?

node.category: What about the scripts on public channels?

node.surface: Also the scripts are often copied off each other.
